member.name: T:Orleans.Serialization.ProtobufNet.ProtobufNetSerializer
member.summary: An implementation of IExternalSerializer for usage with Protobuf types, using the protobuf-net library.

member.name: M:Orleans.Serialization.ProtobufNet.ProtobufNetSerializer.IsSupportedType(System.Type)
member.summary: Determines whether this serializer has the ability to serialize a particular type.
member.param: The type of the item to be serialized
member.returns: A value indicating whether the type can be serialized
